betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oVoid miners are multiblocks that automatically generate resources at random.

Void ore miners are very good at collecting all minerals. 

The higher the tier, the better the drops, and you will unlock additional resources!

It is a good idea to start levelling up your void ore miners ASAP!

§fLet's make things more environmental (and lag) friendly!
And I can make litherite too!
